name: All Sites Dark-Grey for anti eyes fatigue
description:
This theme let every site's background become Dark-grey to anti eyes fatigue.
This this cherish your eyes and also decrease power consumption from lcd/led monitor.
Note : Best result only for facebook other site may has bad experience.
http://userstyles.org/styles/91276/facebook-dark-grey-for-anti-eyes-fatigue
I you have any suggestions or questions please leave it at 
http://blog.umitems.com 
This theme modified from Facebook Dark-N-Grey by yetisquatch http://userstyles.org/users/22787
